text: ‘Tomadera dharmadarsa theke allaha amaderake ud'dhara karara para yadi amara tate phire ya'i tabe to amara allahara prati mithya aropa karaba. Ara amadera raba allaha icche na karale tate phire ya'oya amadera jan'ya samicina naya. Sabakichu'i amadera rabera jnanera simaya rayeche, amara allah‌ra upara'i nirbhara kari. He amadera raba! Amadera o amadera sampradayera madhye n'yayyabhabe phayasala kare dina ebam apani'i srestha phayasalakari.’
